constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 6 (Monday, January 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. YOUNG:
H.R. 272.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, Clause 2
[Page H124]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.

title: To amend the National Marine Sanctuaries Act to prescribe an additional requirement for the designation of marine sanctuaries off the coast of Alaska, and for other purposes.
